name: Duplicate Emails
desc:
Write a SQL query to find all duplicate emails in a table named Person.


+----+---------+
| Id | Email   |
+----+---------+
| 1  | a@b.com |
| 2  | c@d.com |
| 3  | a@b.com |
+----+---------+


For example, your query should return the following for the above table:


+---------+
| Email   |
+---------+
| a@b.com |
+---------+


Note: All emails are in lowercase.

templates.defaultCode: # Write your MySQL query statement below
/* Write your T-SQL query statement below */
/* Write your PL/SQL query statement below */

mysql: Create table If Not Exists Person (Id int, Email varchar(255))
mssql: create table Person ( Id int, Email varchar(255) )
oraclesql: create table Person ( Id int, Email varchar(255) )
